sentences.english: 20 the lampstands of pure gold with their lamps, to burn in front of the inner sanctuary as prescribed;
sentences.chinese: 并精金的灯台和灯盏，可以照例点在内殿前。

sentences.english: Conclusion Breviscapine Injection can treat effectively the posterior circulation ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 结论灯盏花索可有效治疗后循环缺血。

sentences.english: Conclusions Breviscapine can promote healing of ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 结论灯盏花素可有效促进溃疡愈合。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect and mechanisms of breviscapine on hyperglycemia induced by adrenaline in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察灯盏花素对肾上腺素性高血糖的作用及机制。

sentences.english: Objective It is to discuss the clinical curative effect of fleabane injection on acute brain infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨灯盏细辛注射液治疗急性脑梗死的临床疗效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the optic neuroprotection components of Erigeron breviscapus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究灯盏细辛视神经保护的活性成分。

sentences.english: Cerebral infarction; Fleabane injection; Clinical study.
sentences.chinese: 脑梗塞，灯盏花注射液，临床研究。

sentences.english: Objective It is to discuss the antagonism of breviscapine on cochlea toxicity of Cisplatin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨灯盏花素对顺铂耳蜗毒性的拮抗作用。

sentences.english: ConclusionBreviscapine could antagonize Adrena line-induced rise of serum glucose level.
sentences.chinese: 结论灯盏花素能对抗肾上腺素的升血糖作用。

sentences.english: Let the lamp burn in the lonely house.
The lamp waits through the long day of neglect for the flame’s kiss in the night.
sentences.chinese: 灯盏度过漫长而冷漠的白昼，静待夜晚光焰的一吻。

sentences.english: Erigeron Injections Effects on Pathologic and Hepatotoxicity Induced By Intestinal Ischemia-Reperfusion in Mice.
sentences.chinese: 灯盏花注射液对肝损伤病理及生化指标的影响。

sentences.english: Effects of borneol on the pharmacokinetics of scutellarin in rats;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠灌胃给药灯盏花乙素苷元的药动学。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a HPLC-ECD method for determining scutellarin in rat plasma and to study pharmacokinetics of scutellarein in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠灌胃给药灯盏花乙素苷元的药动学。

definition: altar lamp burning day and night
fire and candles/household things that burn
candle light/candle-lit (vigil etc)/candela, unit of luminous intensity (cd)
red candle (used during birthdays and other celebrations)
